description: - Install Nodejs latest version - Install VS code latest version ### How to run this project - Clone the repo - Open termianl in the root folder\ - Give following commands: ``` npm init -y ``` ``` npm test file ./user.test.js ``` **To create mochawesome report**, give following commands: ``` npm i mochawesome ``` ``` npm start file ./User.test.js ```
